translations: n.轮盘赌；刻骑缝孔的点线机；（邮票的）骑缝孔；旋轮线

sentences.sentence: I had been playing roulette at the casino.
sentences.translation: 我过去一直在那家赌场玩轮盘赌。

sentences.sentence: No one is listening. Everyone is jammed around the 800 tables, focused on the flip of cards, the spin of the roulette wheel or the roll of dice.
sentences.translation: 没有人在听。每个人都挤在800张赌台的周围，目不转睛地盯着翻开的纸牌、旋转的轮盘或者滚动的骰子。

sentences.sentence: You are playing Russian roulette every time you have unprotected sex.
sentences.translation: 每次你进行无保护措施的性爱都是在冒不可预料的风险。
